column1: Local Foods////My 9yo latched on to the Thai-inspired lemongrass soup
column2: and my husband asked for a sample to ensure he (and the other kids) would like it before ordering a full bowl.  The employees were happy to give us samples big enough for everyone to taste it
column3: and we all fell in love with the delicious
column5: soup.  They also let us know that they have off-the-menu kids items - grilled cheese and PB&J.
